executable.title: Mapped Mesh (Displacement Control)
executable.description: This program generates a hexahedral mesh for the given suject surface from template meshes using a deformable registration technique based on the surface nodes. The interior are mapped using a thinplate spline based on the location of the mapped surface nodes. This program uses Laplacian smoothing filter to smooth the deformed surface.
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta, Nicole Grosland, and Wen Li. It was developed as part of an NIH NA-MIC Collaboration Grant EB005973.
executable.acknowledgements: This command module was developed as part of an NIH NA-MIC Collaboration Grant EB005973.
